value:
$WmMPID_お茶会シグルド,ch06_04_Siglud_M_Teatime23,Face|Deirdre, Seliph, welcome. Please,
make yourselves at home.$k$p$WmMPID_ディアドラ,ch06_07_Diadora_F_Normal,Face|Thank you... And might I say, my lord
Sigurd, that you look quite dashing
in your server uniform.$k$p$WmMPID_セリス,ch06_00_Celice_M_Normal,Face|I am happy to have you serve us tea,
but, well...that is not the sole reason
I have looked forward to today.$k$p$WmMPID_お茶会ティルテュ,ch06_08_Tailto_F_Teatime23,Face|Ah, Arthur, Tine... Welcome!$k$p$WmMPID_アーサー,ch06_33_Arthur_M_Normal,Face|H-hello.$k$p$WmMPID_ティニー,ch06_32_Tiny_F_Normal,Face|Thank you for inviting us here
today, Mothe—$k$p$WmMPID_お茶会ティルテュ,ch06_08_Tailto_F_Teatime23,Face|Enough formalities! Come, sit!
I prepared great seats for you!$k$p$WmMPID_メルセデス,ch06_06_Ira_FF_Pair,Face|Hee hee... Everyone seems to enjoy
having their loved ones attend to
them for the party.$k$p...Whom did you invite, Ayra?$k$p$nMPID_双界アイラ|...No one.$k$p$nMPID_メルセデス|What? Why is that? Don't you have
a son and daughter you could ask?$k$p$nMPID_双界アイラ|I do... But I was never much of
a mother for them.$k$p$nMPID_メルセデス|Must that stop you?$k$pSurely they do not begrudge you
for the past...do they?$k$p$nMPID_双界アイラ|No. They've told me as much.$k$pBut I still feel it would be somehow
taking advantage of their forgiveness.
And I...$k$p$nMPID_メルセデス|...You what?$k$p$nMPID_双界アイラ|Forget it. What's important is that
we fulfill our duties as servers today.
The tea party is sure to be busy.$k$p$nMPID_メルセデス|Hm. I suppose...$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_お茶会フェルディ,ch17_07_Ferdinant_M_Teatime23,Face|Mmm... What a delectable aroma...
This tea is of the finest quality and
is just about ready to be served.$k$pAre you ready with the snacks that
go with the tea, Lysithea?$k$p$WmMPID_お茶会リシテア,ch17_23_Lysithea_F_Teatime23,Face|*munch* ...Yes. I was just checking
to confirm they'd been prepared well,
and I can happily report they have!$k$p$WmMPID_お茶会フェルディ,ch17_07_Ferdinant_M_Teatime23,Face|Hmm... That seems like fewer than
I'd expect. Won't we need more to
serve everyone?$k$p$WmMPID_お茶会リシテア,ch17_23_Lysithea_F_Teatime23,Face|It's...about refined presentation!
It wouldn't do to simply pile them
all on a plate.$k$pThis arrangement and selection are
the result of careful research—which
I've conducted myself!$k$p$WmMPID_お茶会フェルディ,ch17_07_Ferdinant_M_Teatime23,Face|I see... I suppose I should have known
you would have covered every angle
in your studies, Lysithea.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_お茶会リシテア,ch17_23_Lysithea_F_Teatime23,Face|By arranging them like so, all the
various treats stand out...$k$pThey look nice...despite there being
so few remaining.$k$pI ought to remember this technique.
It may come in handy for some other
tactical purpose later on...$k$p$Sbs150|
